name: SynWave
description: A data storage management API offering the following features:

parameters.name: auth_password
parameters.description: Password to protect this file. auth_username parameter is required if auth_password is set.

parameters.name: expiration_seconds
parameters.description: Number of seconds before the file becomes unavailable.

parameters.name: auth_username
parameters.description: Username to protect this file. auth_password parameter is required if auth_username is set.

parameters.name: download_limit
parameters.description: Number of downloads before the file becomes unavailable.

utterances.utterance: Please upload my vacation photos from Hawaii and set the file to expire after 24 hours.
Can you upload the project report PDF and restrict it so only I can access it with a password?
Upload the latest episode of the podcast and limit the downloads to 50 times before it becomes unavailable.
I want to upload my resume and protect it with a username and password, and make sure it expires in 7 days.
Could you upload the conference presentation slides and set it so it can only be downloaded 10 times?
Upload the family video from last Christmas and make it available for just 2 hours without any password protection.
Please upload the software installer and secure it with username 'devteam' and password 'devpass123', no expiration needed.
I need to upload the financial spreadsheet and limit its availability to 100 downloads only.
Upload the new album tracks and set them to expire after 3 days with password protection for user 'musicfan'.
Can you upload the research data files and make sure they expire in 12 hours and can only be downloaded 5 times?
